description:
Takuma Akutsu is not an attractive guy. In fact, his hulking size and ugly face have earned him the nickname "demon", which is ironic since all he really wants is to be left alone. But you know who never pays attention to what people want? The King of the Gods, Odin, who decides that Takuma is the one person who can save Earth from complete destruction.

As a result, Takuma finds his school, class and home all infiltrated by Odin's nine luscious Valkyrie daughters and, in order to become the Army of One that Odin seeks, Takuma has to use love to forge the Valkyrie's maidenly powers into the ultimate force for saving the world. Yeah, no pressure there, right? Can Takuma man up and ride all nine Valkyries to save the Earth?

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: ศึกxรัก วัลเลิฟ

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Dullahan
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a Dullahan, a creature from Irish Folklore with a head that can be detached from its main body.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakura681) | [Pixiv](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=11115999)

His older brother is fellow mangaka [Shizumu Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/107131).

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

Satomi is a female songwriter belonging to Smile Company. She was born in Hokkaido.

Satomi debuted as songwriter in November, 2000 for to-ya's debut single "are you...?". She won a prize at the 45th Japanese Japan Record Grand Prix in 2003. She was for a short time part of the music group double S, formed by Shinozaki Ryuuichi (篠崎隆一).

__[Website](https://www.peakasoul.net/kurosu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/krossy)__

__Katsuhiko Kurosu__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926).
Hayato Tanaka, alternatively known by his stage names Haya10, Hayabusa and Floor on the Intelligence, is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger.

**Height:** 150cm

[Website](https://rikakoaida.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Rikako_Aida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aida_rikako_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwvbv52NmPIHMIVDp3Jqrw)

Rikako Aida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan. She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is affiliated with Ken Production.

On August 21, 2024, she made her VTuber debut as Rikyako (りきゃこ). 

**Non-anime roles:**
• Merlyn - Memento Mori (VG)
• Desert Flannel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Quartz - Arknights (VG)
• CAWS - Girls' Frontline (VG)
• EM-2 - Girls' Frontline (VG)

__Height:__ 164 cm

[Website](https://mausu.net/talent/kakuma-ai.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aimausu)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Agency Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=78) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hondo_dagaya_)

A Japanese voice actor affiliated with I'm Enterprise.

Hondo had an interest in anime from a young age, in particular the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/20/) series. She became interested in acting and modelling while in elementary school. She made her voice acting debut in 2015, and later that same year, she was cast in her first main role as [Kokoro Yotsuba](https://anilist.co/character/134716/), the protagonist of the anime series [Kamisama Minarai: Himitsu no Cocotama](https://anilist.co/anime/21237/).

She won Best New Actress at the 13th Seiyuu Awards for her role as [Hitomi Mishima](https://anilist.co/character/89230/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Lunalynn - Memento Mori (VG)
- Novel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ciel - Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon- (VN)
- Voyager - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
- Ajitani Hifumi - Blue Archive (VG)
- Phoebe - Wuthering Waves (VG) 
- Motoha Arai - Persona 5: The Phantom X (VG)

__Height:__ 152 cm
__Agency:__ StarCrew

[Profile](https://www.starcrew.co.jp/talent/hidakarina/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hidaka_rina0615) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rina_hidaka615)

She announced on her Twitter account that she married the voice actor [Yuuma Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/119617) on January 1st, 2024.

**Non-Anime Roles**:
• Miyako Sakuma - Kirisame ga Furu Mori (Drama CD)
• Clara - Honkai: Star Rail
• Neon - Goddess of Victory: Nikke

[Profile (Peerless Gerbera)](http://pg-wcf.co.jp/profile/04/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/koiwai-kotori/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koiwai_kotori) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClDfVHJxrsGTq61MJp55s3Q) | [ASMR Website](https://www.kotoneiro.com/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kotori_Koiwai) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/小岩井ことり)

Kotori Koiwai is a Japanese voice actress, songwriter, and lyricist from Kyoto. She is affiliated with Peerless Gerbera.

__Non-anime roles:__
• Suzutsuki (Azur Lane)
• Yun Jin (Genshin Impact)
• Rin (Princess Connect Re:Dive)
